Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - the type of the input elements in the pipeline
END - the type of the output elements in the pipeline
All Known Subinterfaces:
BranchedPipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>, Pipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
Enclosing interface:
BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
public static interface BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
The `Builder` interface represents a builder for creating pipelines in a fluent manner. It provides methods for adding stages to the pipeline, such as giving input elements, filtering elements, mapping elements to a new type, piping to another pipeline, processing elements, and running code.

    • filterMap

      <NEW_END> BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,NEW_END> filterMap(Predicate<END> filter, Function<END,NEW_END> ifTrue)
      Filters the elements of the pipeline based on the given predicate and maps them to a new type using the provided function.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the new elements in the pipeline
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the function used to map the filtered elements to a new type
      Returns:
      a new Builder instance with the filtered and mapped elements

    • filterMap

      <NEW_END> BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,NEW_END> filterMap(Predicate<END> filter, Function<END,NEW_END> ifTrue, Function<END,NEW_END> ifFalse)
      Filters the elements of the pipeline based on the given predicate and maps them to a new type.
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - the type of the elements in the resulting pipeline
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the function to apply to elements that satisfy the predicate
      ifFalse - the function to apply to elements that do not satisfy the predicate
      Returns:
      a new Builder instance with the filtered and mapped elements

    • filterProcess

      BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END> filterProcess(Predicate<END> filter, Consumer<END> ifTrue)
      Filters the pipeline process based on the given filter predicate. If the filter predicate evaluates to true, the provided consumer is executed.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the pipeline process
      ifTrue - the consumer to be executed if the filter predicate evaluates to true
      Returns:
      the updated pipeline Builder

    • filterProcess

      BasePipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END> filterProcess(Predicate<END> filter, Consumer<END> ifTrue, Consumer<END> ifFalse)
      Filters the elements in the pipeline based on the given predicate and performs different actions depending on whether the predicate is true or false.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter the elements
      ifTrue - the consumer to be executed for elements that pass the filter
      ifFalse - the consumer to be executed for elements that do not pass the filter
      Returns:
      the Builder instance with the filter process added
